Grid layouts

How to use it

Simply fill a .wk-row with .wk-col items. Remember the sum must be always 12.

Stacking Columns

<div class="wk-row">
  <div class="wk-col-4"></div>
  <div class="wk-col-1"></div>
  <div class="wk-col-4"></div>
  <div class="wk-col-1"></div>
  <div class="wk-col-2"></div>
</div>

Persistent Columns

<div class="wk-row-persist">
  <div class="wk-col-4"></div>
  <div class="wk-col-1"></div>
  <div class="wk-col-4"></div>
  <div class="wk-col-1"></div>
  <div class="wk-col-2"></div>
</div>

Nesting

You can nest columns inside others

<div class="wk-row">
  <div class="wk-col-12">
    <div class="wk-row">
      <div class="wk-col-2"></div>
      <div class="wk-col-8"></div>
      <div class="wk-col-2"></div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
